Edwin Arthur Gibson (Jụn 2, 1926 ruo Nọvemba 20, 2011) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na-arụ ọrụ na Indianapolis, Indiana site na 1946 ruo 2002.  Ọrụ ya bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ ihe mbụ

Gibson bụ onye mbụ Afrịka-Amerịka architect debanyere aha na steeti Indiana, onye mbụ African-American architect a họpụtara dị ka Indiana's State Architect, na onye mbụ  Afrịka-Amerịka Architect na Indiana iji nwee ụlọ ọrụ nke ya
Ọrụ ogologo oge ya gụnyere ọrụ na ngalaba ọha na eze na nke onwe
Gibson meriri ọtụtụ ihe mgbochi iji nwee ihe ịga nke ọma ma nwee mmesapụ aka n'inye ndụmọdụ na inyere ndị na-eto eto na-ewu ụlọ aka inweta ihe ịga nke ahụ.
A mụrụ Gibson na Jụn 2, 1925, na Cumberland, Maryland, ma dị ka onye ntorobịa ọ kwagara Indianapolis, Indiana, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Crispus Attucks High School
Ọ gara n'ihu gụsịrị akwụkwọ na pasent ise kachasị elu nke klas ya na Mahadum Illinois ebe ọ natara Bachelors na Masters of Science na Architectural Engineering
Gibson lụrụ Mary E
Gibson, ha nwere ụmụ nwoke abụọ, Edwin A
Gibson, Jr
na Gary A
Gibson
na otu nwa nwanyị, Eve M
Williams
Gibsons bụ nne na nna ụmụ ụmụ ise: Edwin A
Gibson, Elliott A
Gibson
Jason P
Gibson, Delford G
Williams IV, na Brenton P
Williams, na ụmụ ụmụ abụọ: Laura E
Hanley na Melinda L
Hanley site na nwunye nwa ha Elizabeth Booth-Gibson
Edwin A
Gibson nwụrụ na Danville, Indiana na Nọvemba 20, 2011, mgbe ọ dị afọ 86
E liri ya na Crown Hill Cemetery na Indianapolis, Indiana.
Ọrụ ogologo oge ya, nke sitere na 1945 ruo 2002, gụnyere ọrụ na ngalaba ọha na eze na nke onwe
Ọ malitere na A
M
Strauss Associates, Inc., ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ihe owuwu na Fort Wayne, ebe ọ ghọrọ onye mmekọ na onye na-ahụ n'ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
O mechara kwaga Indianapolis ịmalite ụlọ ọrụ nke ya

N'afọ 1962, Gibson meriri Gọvanọ Award for Outstanding Achievement, otu afọ ka e mesịrị, n'afọ 1963, a họpụtara ya dị ka Indiana State Architect, ọkwá o nwere afọ abụọ, ọ hapụrụ n'afọ 1965 iji rụọ ọrụ maka Chas
W
Cole & Son, dị ka Architect-Director na-elekọta ụlọ ọrụ Indianapolis
N'otu afọ ahụ, Indiana Society of Architects, AIA, sọpụrụ Gibson site na nkwanye ùgwù maka ọrụ bara uru, nke e nyere ya na Ọktoba 8, 1965.
Gibson meghere ụlọ ọrụ nke ya (Ed Gibson & Associates, Inc.), ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ihe owuwu na injinia, n'afọ 1968
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nọ na-arụ ọrụ ruo 1986 mgbe ọ gbasara ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, wee hapụ ya ịrụ ọrụ naanị maka Ụlọ Ọgwụ Metọdist
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị Ụlọ Ọgwụ Metọdist, Gibson rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na-ahụ maka ihe owuwu ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na 2002

Ụfọdụ n'ime ụlọ ndị ọ chepụtara ma ọ bụ rụzigharịa dị na Ụlọ Ọgwụ Metọdist dị na Indianapolis, Ụlọ Ọgwụ steeti Evansville, Central Elementary na Plainfield, Broad Ripple Library, mmezigharị na Central Library dị na Indiapolis, IUPUI, IU Bloomington, gụnyere imezigharị Ernie Pyle Hall, Hudnut Plaza, na ọrụ HUD ndị ọzọ n'Indiana.

Mgbe Gibson mechiri ọrụ onwe ya na 1987 iji rụọ ọrụ naanị maka Ụlọ Ọgwụ Metọdist, a tụfuru ọtụtụ n'ime ihe osise dị n'ọfịs ya na ndị dị na nchịkọta ihe ncheta a bụ ihe atụ ole na ole nke ọrụ ya fọdụrụ

N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ nwụsịrị na 2011, ezinụlọ ya nyere onyinye ọzọ nke foto na akwụkwọ, gụnyere thesis Master of Science ya, onyinye, na asambodo na Ball State University Drawings and Documents Archive
Ezinụlọ ahụ nyekwara ihe ndekọ nke onwe Gibson nke e dere na mbido ya, nke a pụrụ ịhụ na nchịkọta dijitalụ.
